messages.title: Our next MP will be Mike or Labour
messages.content: Elections in Hull are always a close race between the Liberal Democrats and the Labour Party. More and more local people are switching to back local Lib Dem campaigner Mike Ross this time.

mentions.tacticalSituation: They know that only Mike can beat Labour, and that a vote for either UKIP or the Conservatives will just help Labour to win again here.

contactInformation.address: Mike Ross, Hull Liberal Democrats, FREEPOST RSEH-XLSX-ACKU, Hull, HU8 8QT

images.caption: Mike Ross - A strong, local voice for Hull

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet provides statistics of the previous voting percentages for Liberal Democrats, Labour, and Conservatives, indicating the Liberal Democrats are close to Labour and positing Mike Ross as the viable alternative to Labour. It also contains a donation form for the campaign.
